articles.title: Paul McCartney started Beatles in terraced home 'with no hope' - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: The McCartney's childhood home will be home to music once again
articles.content:
Paul McCartney's brother has shared how life in a Liverpool suburb helped shape the Beatles.
 Performer and visual artist Mike McCartney grew up alongside brother Paul in 20 Forthlin Road, Liverpool… [+3139 chars]
